problem_text_cn: 如图,过⊙O外一点P引⊙O的两条切线PA、PB,切点分别是A、B,OP交⊙O于点C,点D是⁀{AEB}上不与点A、点C重合的一个动点,连接AD、CD,若∠APB=60°,则∠ADC的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the two tangents PA and PB of a point P outside ⊙O, the tangent points are respectively A and B, OP intersects ⊙O at point C, and point D is a moving point on ⁀AEB and it does not coincide with points A and C, connect AD and CD, if ∠APB = N_0, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
